      • checkDirectories

        public static void checkDirectories()
                             throws MatrixonatorIOException
        Performs IO startup checks and defines path separators for running OS If an error occurs, will save a noSave flag where any IO operation is blocked. Application can still perform calculations

        MatrixonatorIOException
